item.author: Lukasz Plotnicki
item.content:
My name is Lukasz and I really like creating products together with awesome teams. My current role in this is of the tech lead and tech-wise I’m getting my hands dirty with Java, Scala and JavaScript with a proper amount of terraform for the infrastructure. Currently @ ThoughtWorks.

This is a personal weblog. The opinions expressed here represent my own and not those of my employer.

My public key fingerprint
